summary: Project to create a FF7 Armor that is similar to Sephiroths Armor.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://getpersonas-cdn.mozilla.net/static_json/3/1/67731/preview_large.jpg?1260925626[/img]

NEED HELP WITH THE SIZE AND THE UV MAP

Project to create a FF7 Armor that is similar to Sephiroths Armor.

I have already maked a mesh. (Completly made from scratch only used reference images and male skyrim vanilla body mesh)

What still is need to do.

1. To make sure that the armor has the right size. (Comments of the community would be great)

2. To UV map it. (Need help with it to work further on this mod)

3. To Texture it.

4. To make a nif with it.

5. To make an esp with it.

I hope there will be people who wants to help me with it. ;-)


Permission Notes.
Armor inspired by FF7 Sephiroth.
Made it from scratch so no uploads to other sides unless you contact me and i give permission. 

Expression of thanks 
Thanks to Bethesda for Skyrim, for one of the greatest games in the world.
Thanks to Square Enix for FF7, the greatest game i know. 


[img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20090721160447/finalfantasy/images/f/f2/Sephiroth_in_flames.png[/img]
author: mach1991
